trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a XAML serialization attempt is made on a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue`1" /> or <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue`1" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference`1" /> 嘗試進行 XAML 序列化時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> and <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> are used for lambda expressions specified in code and are not XAML serializable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> 和 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 會用來當做程式碼中指定的 Lambda 運算式，不可序列化為 XAML。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>, a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試序列化包含 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> 或 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 的工作流程，會擲回 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>, or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a serializable format.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含的工作流程需要 XAML 序列化，請使用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> 或 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>，或者使用 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> 將 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> 或 <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> 轉換成可序列化的格式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 擲回例外狀況相關的序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資料，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況，若未指定內部例外狀況，則為 null 參考 (Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaSerializationException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
